channel.description: Recent content in Api on Mesh Studio

item.title: API Strategy for an Insurance Giant
item.description: Founded in 1957 as a subsidiary of Safeco Insurance, Symetra Financial Corporation offers a suite of insurance, benefit, and retirement products to consumers in the United States. Through a nationwide network of financial institutions, broker-dealers, independent agents, advisors, and benefits consultants, the company serves over 2 million customers and has over $42 billion in assets under management. As of February 2016 Symetra is wholly owned subsidiary of Sumitomo Life in Japan and is headquartered in Bellevue, Washington.

item.title: Leveling Up Health Savings Accounts
item.description: Lively is a software company that helps employers offer a modern Health Savings Account (HSA) to their employees. Their product streamlines the process of setting-up an HSA and offers a convenient dashboard to manage and administer the benefit. Lively also helps employees take full advantage of their HSA by allowing them to invest the money that they contribute into the account. â€œOur goal is to facilitate and optimize how individuals save for healthcare expenses.
